segments.text: I see a woman standing in front of the sink, completely focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is a lovely shade of blue, and the way she polishes the dish is almost mesmerizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can't help but notice the water overflowing from the sink, trickling down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so absorbed and not realize the chaos around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing larger at her feet, and it makes me anxious just watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks so peaceful through the window, contrasting sharply with the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just take a moment to look around, to see whatâ€™s happening right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR
